thread.title: Deepika Padukone, Neha Dhupia And Soha Ali Khan At The Gillette Venus Event
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone, Neha Dhupia And Soha Ali Khan At The Gillette Venus Event

author: Koimoi.Com Team
title: Deepika Padukone, Neha Dhupia And Soha Ali Khan At The Gillette Venus Event
text:
tweet Actress Deepika Padukone recently made her big Hollywood debut with xXx: Return Of Xander cage. Now, the actress is in Mumbai, shooting for her upcoming film Padmavati. She was recently snapped at an event organized by a brand she endorses and we have to say the diva looked stunning in a denim dress. Also accompanying her were Soha Ali Khan and Neha Dhupia. 
Check out pictures from the event here: Deepika Padukone At The Gillette Venus Event Deepika Padukone At The Gillette Venus Event Neha Dhupia At The Gillette Venus Event Soha Ali Khan , Deepika Padukone And Neha Dhupia At The Gillette Venus Event Deepika Padukone At The Gillette Venus Event Deepika Padukone At The Gillette Venus Event Soha Ali Khan , Deepika Padukone And Neha Dhupia At The Gillette Venus Event Padmavati starring Ranveer Singh and Shahid Kapoor along with Deepika is all set to release this November. The film is being helmed by director Sanjay Leela Bhansali. TAGS
